name: Words8
overview: An 8 player game from Petr Chlud for party fun. A fun word game for the right 8 geeks. Search for words in a constantly changing array of letters using the joystick. if you don't have 8 PLAYER ADAPTERS, you can use joy in port 1 and 2. the menu allows you to choose the game adapter, change the name of the players (joy right), the length of the game, vowel highlighting, hiding words, the rate of letter change and complete change of the play field after word approval ...
